title: Strengthening Programming Practice Competencies: Designing Mathematical Problem-Solving Projects Through Digital Fabrication Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Students can apply the PBL (Problem-Based Learning) methodology to create design documents analyzing real-world mathematical problems
Learners can produce multimodal content visualizing mathematical concepts using digital tools (apps/programming)
Collaborate with team members to design a mathematical problem-solving process and conduct peer feedback sessions on deliverables
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
